statements: SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events
SELECT event_id, venue, event_date FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT venue, count(*) as num_events FROM wine_tasting_events GROUP BY venue
SELECT event_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(participants) as num_participants FROM wine_tasting_events
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, venue FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE venue LIKE '%Winery%';
SELECT event_id, COUNT(participants) AS total_participants FROM wine_tasting_events GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT event_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(wine_selections) AS wine FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events;
SELECT id, venue, event_date FROM wine_tasting_events;
SELECT venue, participants FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, wine_name, grape_variety, region FROM wine_selections;
SELECT * FROM wine_selections WHERE region = 'Bordeaux';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND participants LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY venue DESC;
SELECT id, venue FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE venue LIKE '%Garden%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT wine_name, grape_variety, region FROM wine_selections WHERE region = 'France' ORDER BY wine_name ASC, grape_variety DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, AVG(LENGTH(participants)) AS avg_participants FROM wine_tasting_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT venue, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM wine_tasting_events GROUP BY venue HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_events;
SELECT event_id, venue_name FROM wine_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, event_date FROM wine_events WHERE venue_name = 'Wine Mansion';
SELECT participant_name, wine_name, available_quantity FROM wine_selections WHERE wine_type = 'Red' ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT event_id, participant_name FROM participants JOIN wine_events ON participants.participant_name = wine_events.participant_name;
SELECT * FROM wine_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, event_date FROM wine_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, venue_name FROM wine_events INNER JOIN participants ON wine_events.participant_name = participants.participant_name;
SELECT wine_type, SUM(available_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM wine_selections GROUP BY wine_type;

SELECT event_id, venue_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS num_participants FROM wine_events LEFT JOIN participants ON wine_events.participant_name = participants.participant_name GROUP BY event_id, venue_name;
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_id, name, location FROM Venue;
SELECT event_id, date, venue_id FROM Event;
SELECT selection_id, wine_type, event_id, participant_id FROM WineSelection;
SELECT name, email FROM Participant;
SELECT * FROM Venue
SELECT event_id, date FROM Event
SELECT participant_id, name, email FROM Participant
SELECT selection_id, wine_type FROM WineSelection
SELECT venue_id, name, location FROM Venue
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, venue FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, event_date FROM Participants JOIN Events ON Participants.event_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Event_Participants GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, wine_name FROM Event_Wines JOIN Wines ON Event_Wines.wine_id = Wines.wine_id ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, venue FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, venue, event_date FROM Participants JOIN Events ON Participants.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE venue = 'Venue A';
SELECT event_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Event_Participants GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, wine_name, wine_type FROM Event_Wines JOIN Wines ON Event_Wines.wine_id = Wines.wine_id WHERE wine_type = 'Red';
